Articles.Content:
So I have been playing around with RSS, RO and especially FASA. I decided to try my first orbital rendezvous in RSS using the Gemini Spacecraft and the Agena Target Vehicle. Overall, I was pretty successful, but I had to use most of the fuel in the Gemini service module adjusting my orbit because I messed up the Titan-II launch. I'm still trying to figure out the optimal ascent profile to use with it. Here's some pictures:

http://imgur.com/a/tqQBo

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Really awesome stuff! I agree..gemini is fun to mess around with, though I seem to prefer Mercury or Apollo myself.
Nice mission! Gemini is a thing of beauty, especially the FASA Gemini. Reminds me that I need to get another RSS install set up....
Ya I agree with you guys. That was my first time docking in RSS so I wanted to do it a couple of times before I do an apollo mission.

Ya I agree with you guys. That was my first time docking in RSS so I wanted to do it a couple of times before I do an apollo mission.

can't wait to see that!
